channel.title: animation studio on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in animation studio on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Sony Pictures Animation Logo
Sony Pictures Animation Inc. is an American animation studio owned by Sony Entertainment’s Sony Pictures Entertainment through their Motion Picture Group division and founded on May 9, 2002. The studio’s films are distributed worldwide by Sony Pictures Releasing under their Columbia Pictures label, while all direct-to-video releases are released by Sony Pictures Home Entertainment. The first film produced by Sony Pictures Animation, Open Season, was released on September 29, 2006.
You can download theSony Pictureslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Sony Pictures
item.description: Sony Pictures Animation Inc. is an American animation studio owned by Sony Entertainment’s Sony Pictures Entertainment through their Motion Picture Group division and founded on May 9, 2002. The studio’s films are distributed worldwide by Sony Pictures Releasing under their Columbia Pictures label, while all direct-to-video releases are released by Sony Pictures Home Entertainment. The first film produced by Sony Pictures Animation, Open Season, was released on September 29, 2006.
